articles.description: The First Semi Final between the Brisbane Lions and Western Bulldogs will start at 7.20pm AEST at the Gabba
articles.content: The AFL has today confirmed a start time of 7:20pm AEST for the First Semi Final of the 2021 Toyota AFL Finals Series between the Brisbane Lions and the Western Bulldogs to be held at The Gabba on Sa… [+2509 chars]
